item.title: Ten dead in Austria school shooting
item.description: Police say the gunman is among the dead, with the Interior Minister saying he was a former pupil.

item.title: UK sanctions far-right Israeli ministers over Gaza comments
item.description: Security Minister Itamar Ben-Gvir and Finance Minister Bezalel Smotrich will both face a travel ban, the UK says.

item.title: Newsom says Trump 'deranged' as thousands more troops sent to LA
item.description: Protests against immigration raids by the Trump administration spring up in at least nine other US cities.

item.title: Teaching assistant killed in stabbing outside France school
item.description: French President Emmanuel Macron said that the "nation was in mourning" after the death of the 31-year-old.

item.title: Greta Thunberg deported, Israel says, after Gaza aid boat intercepted
item.description: The activists' yacht, which was trying to carry aid to Gaza, was intercepted by Israeli forces in the early hours of Monday.
